divs: sighting detailsi was on board a flight to richmond, va and was looking out the window at the lights of the city as it grew darker and darker. we were about 10-12 minutes away from landing, and i noticed a strange series of 5-8 bright yellow\orange\white lights in a horizontal line that were hovering above some buildings in the city. they suddenly formed into a circle, and then continued to form in a straight vertical line. all at once, they shot straight up into the sky, leaving behind a jet trail. if i heard others correctly on that side of the plane (right side, same as me), they were asking "what was that?," "did you see that?" so i'm pretty sure that i was not the only one. i felt nervous, especially sense i was on an airplane that was already turbulent. i tried to think of military tests, fireworks, airshows, etc, but i haven't been able to form a reasonable conclusion to what i saw tonight on the airplane.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Chesterfield
There were no other sightings in Chesterfield on or around October 14th 2012
Summary: Horizontal string of bright lights above buildings (I was in airplane), formed circular pattern, became vertical, and shot straight up into the sky.
